patthana16.12:1.1_0: Kusalaṁ kenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nakenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.12:1.1_1: Kusalaṁ kenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nakenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.12:1.1_2: Kusalaṁ kenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naabyākato nakenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.12:1.1_4: ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate ekūnavīsati.
patthana16.12:2.1_0: Kusalaṁ kenaci naviññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nakenaci naviññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.12:2.1_1: Kusalaṁ kenaci naviññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nakenaci naviññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.12:2.1_2: Kusalaṁ kenaci naviññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naabyākato nakenaci naviññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana16.12:3.1_1: ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate ekūnavīsati.
patthana16.12:3.1_2: (Etena upāyena kenaci naviññeyye ekūnavīsati pañhā kātabbā.)
